metadata.Title: CVE-2020-8991 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: ** DISPUTED ** vg_lookup in daemons/lvmetad/lvmetad-core.c in LVM2 2.02 mismanages memory, leading to an lvmetad memory leak, as demonstrated by running pvs. NOTE: RedHat disputes CVE-2020-8991 as not being a vulnerability since thereâ€™s no apparent route to either privilege escalation or to denial of service through the bug.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> This CVE is disputed, not a security issue, marking as not-affected.

criterions.comment: lvm2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
lvm2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
